participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Resilient and creative, Amina expresses herself through dance and has a strong will to overcome challenges.
participant_1.background: i like to dance. i was born in somalia. i was forced to marry when i was a child. my aunt helped me escape when i was a teenager. now i live in the united states.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and sociable, Jessica enjoys spending time with friends and is excited about her upcoming wedding.
participant_2.background: i am 24 years old. i love eating out with friends. i'm getting married in the spring. my favorite singer is taylor swift.
